items.sentence: Do you think your parents spent enough time with you when you were in your teens?
I have to be honest. I was a little bit nervous the first time I had an MRI scan.
I imagine that Tom will eventually convince Mary to let him buy a new motorcycle.
I don\'t have a lot of work, but it\'s enough to keep me in the office this week.
If you want to talk to Tom about this, let me know and I\'ll give you his number.
